snippet: President Nicolás Maduro on Friday ordered the government takeover of a supermarket chain that officials have accused of hoarding products as part of an “economic war” against his government.
abstract: Venezualan Pres Nicolas Maduro orders government supermarket network Pdval to take over Dia a Dia chain, which has been accused by officials of waging economic war on people by hoarding food.
lead_paragraph: President Nicolás Maduro on Friday ordered the government takeover of a supermarket chain that officials have accused of hoarding products as part of an “economic war” against his government.

headline.main: Venezuela: Grocery Chain to Be Seized
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Grocery Chain to Be Seized
